title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 120: Featuring Jordin Tootoo
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by recently retired Jordin Tootoo. The guys talk about where Jordin grew up, what it took for him to get to the NHL, his sobriety, his NHL career and a ton more. The guys also get into the recent NHL news regarding the league going all in on gambling. The fellas also touch on John Tortorella's comments about the league becoming a giant hug fest and wrap up with RA's gambling corner.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
